post:
Ahoy there!

Just another domain auction, running through Black Friday, till the end of the month.

Though some of these names may not really be related to IT/Hosting industry, but I believe they can still be used for various purposes, such as email address, personal/project website or blog, a hostname for your server, an IRC vhost, or just to add another domain in your portfolio (if you have one) and decide what to do with it later

  1. makaveli (dot) org
    Expiry: 18th August 2020

  2. botnets (dot) org
    Expiry: 25th August 2020

  3. tcp6 (dot) org
    Expiry: 25th September 2020

  4. menacing (dot) net
    Expiry: 25th September 2020

  5. 64bit (dot) org
    Expiry: 28th September 2020

  6. spoofer (dot) net
    Expiry: 29th September 2020

  7. bawse (dot) net
    Expiry: 29th September 2020

Rules:

  • The starting price for each domain name is $8, with a bid increment of $1 (minimum).
  • Bid on the number and do not post/mention the domain name. (eg: 1 - $8)
  • This will be a straight up auction, no BIN, so the domain(s) will go to the highest bidder.

Payment Method:

  • PayPal (Payment to be made within 24 hours from end of auction. Winner covers PayPal fees, if any.)

When auction has ended and when payment has been dealt with, the domain(s) can be transferred via 2 methods:

  1. Pushed within Dynadot via Dynadot Forum Name.
  2. EPP/AUTH code will be provided to the winner should the winner chooses to have the domain name transferred out of Dynadot, to a different registrar. Winner takes the cost for the transfer.

Auction Ends:
Saturday, 30 November 2019, 23:59:59 (Stockholm)

Thank You and Good Luck!
